BengtDialogue2: ^Hey there! How's it going with those upgrades?

g-0: ^It took a while, but my boat is officially fully upgraded!
^Sweet! Will you be heading home, then?
g-1: ^When I talked to Irma, she brought up her sister and how she had gone missing.
^It might be related to whatever happened to my parents.
^I can't leave until I at least investigate some more.
^[Gaze cast downward, Bengt awkwardly shuffles his feet.]
^[He's all red in the face. Weird.]
g-2: ^Hey, what's going on? You look like you're about to pop.
^I know what happened to your parents...! Or, I think I do.
^Agh, it's complicated! Y'know this place is weird sometimes!
g-3: ^There's this thing that happens every week.
^A big ol' whirlpool forms somewhere on the archipelago and swallows things up!
^I'm pretty sure that's what happened. Not just to your parents, but Irma's sister, too.
g-4: ^Why wouldn't you tell me? Or Irma?
^Well, no one has ever come back after falling in!
^Me, Sigrid, Ulrich and Vera all agreed to keep it hidden so no one would think to risk it.
^We were lucky that Irma doesn't leave her island much...
^... but it would be much harder for someone like you to not notice.
^Oh, but it's so stressful keeping it secret! You have no idea how relieving it is to spill the beans like this.
g-5: ^How do I get to the whirlpool? When does it show up?
^... Actually, come to think of it, with your boat all bolstered up the way it is now...
^... you might be able to pass through it without too much damage.
^[Bengt slaps his knee and looks at you with renewed vigor.]
^It's actually just about time for it to show up again.
^All you need to do is seek it out, and head straight into it!
g-6: ^I'll find that whirlpool. It's the only lead I have!
^That's the spirit! Phew, I'm SO relieved!
g-7: ^Sure, I don't mind. But what's on it?
^Everything I just told you. Because, well, she should know, right?
^I wrote it ages ago, but never sent it.
^I'll owe her big time for making her wait this long, though.
^Anyway, off you go! I'm rooting for you!
